summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackButtah's Gente Face Cleanser removes unwanted impurities while enriching essential oils and maintaining skin's natural pH. Soothing Coconut Oil and Lavender Flower Extract condition to calm your complexion, leaving your skin smooth, hydrated and healthy looking.
details: DetailsBenefitsCleanses, removes unwanted impurities while enriching essential oils and maintaining skin's natural pHKey IngredientsSoothing Coconut Oil and Lavender Flower Extract condition to calm your complexionLavender Flower Extract Calms irritation and soothes skinCitric Acid An alpha-hydroxy acid that gently exfoliates, refines and renews skin textureItem 2585288How To UseSqueeze a penny-size amount into palm. Massage over damp skin in a circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with cool water. Excellent for daily use on all skin types.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Lavender Flower Extract, Panthenol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Squeeze a penny-size amount into palm. Massage over damp skin in a circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with cool water. Excellent for daily use on all skin types.

reviews.headline: I will never buy this product again☹️
reviews.comments: This product left my skin with horrible acne and black marks. I wanted to help support this black owned business and help my skin while doing so. Unfortunately this left my skin even worse off than before. All it did was clog my pores and make my skin feel bad. It's not worth your time or money. I regret wasting my money on this sooo bad!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this cleanser. It is light and effective.  It lathers well on the face too.

reviews.headline: Husband and wife 10 weeks worth of use
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product because it is black owned. Unfortunately this product did not work well for me nor my husband. The product actually made our skin worse! I didnt have trouble with acne but my husband does. I tried this line with him since my skin was problem free. Well after using this product for 10 weeks I have dark spots and acne. Which i never dealt with. My husband has even more acne than he had before he started. I have went back to anither brand I was using before trying this and slowly my skin is returning to how it was before trying buttah. Buttah isn't non comdogenic which means it has ingredients that could potentially clog your pores and cause problems or worsen your current skin issues.

reviews.headline: My skin was clean and soft
reviews.comments: After washing my it usually tight., but this cleanser it was soft and bright.

reviews.headline: breakouts
reviews.comments: This cleanser left my face with giant painful pimples.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: The store associate was very helpful in helping me find the Buttah Skin Cleanser.

reviews.headline: Product color not as advertised and did not lather
reviews.comments: I ordered this product online via ulta and was excited to use it..upon opening it looked like it was already opened and then I noticed the color of the face wash came out of the tube with an orange color. It also didn't lather up at all. I wasn't sure what the color of the product should be and looked it up to only find out it should be clear. I'm going to return to Ulta and hopefully they have one in stock at the store and I will be opening before I exchange to make sure the product color is clear.  If not, I will just try and order directly from the sellers site and hope for the best. I do also feel like the size of the product is a but small for the price. I can't give an accurate rating until I receive a product that is in the proper formula/color, upon opening and using but my review is based on the product Ulta shipped to me. They need to do a better process of checking their items before shipping out.

reviews.headline: NO MORE ACNE!
reviews.comments: Finally found a cleanser that isnt super expensive and works great! Doesnt dry out my skin like other cleaners and is light weight. It has a tiny scent to it that i actually really like when putting it on. It has helped my breakouts as i barely have any now! I have gotten so many compliments on my skin and the only difference in my skin care is adding this cleanser to it! Definitely give it a try you wont be disappointed.

reviews.headline: Will buy again.
reviews.comments: Bought this for my husband and he loved it. He has acne prone skin and this has been helping his skin clear up a bit.

reviews.headline: I would but this product again and again
reviews.comments: Love this for my skin

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Great bargain

reviews.headline: Oily/Acne-Prone Skin
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this cleanser & I paired it with the AHA/BHA toner. I've been using for about a month after trial and error with Peach & Lily, YTP and Tatcha. This cleared all closed comedones and white heads from my forehead and chin area!

reviews.headline: Perfect Cleanser for Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I have tried genuinely about 50 different types of cleansers over the years because my skin hates just about everything. This has been my go to cleanser for the last year! It leaves my skin so soft, refreshed, smooth, and it genuinely leaves it feeling CLEAN. I love using this after taking my makeup off bc it doesn't further irritate my skin and it doesn't dry it out. I have dry skin most of the time but get oily prone in hotter weather or with makeup and I feel like this helps combat that. Cannot suggest this cleanser enough!

reviews.headline: Skin Care made easy for me
reviews.comments: Skin care should be simple not hard

reviews.headline: Skin Care made easy for me
reviews.comments: All the products work well together, makes skin care easy , quick

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: The cleanser is not great product. I clean well but it dries the skin out and it does make it feel fresh. However it doesn't do what the advertising pretend to do. The cost if all the product cleanser, oil moisture and serum is not worth the price.

reviews.headline: This product is amazing!
reviews.comments: This was my first time trying this cleanser and let me just say it is FANTASTIC! I struggle with dry skin patches near my nose and this has been the only cleanser that works against that! It keeps my skin glowing and moisturized throughout the day! If you're thinking about it, just give it a try!

reviews.headline: this is my second time purchase\ing
reviews.comments: I love this cleaner and I will buy it again and again, it's help with my oily skin and I also have the toner and the vitamin C and also the moisture for oily skin and I live it, I also purchase the face towel, you can't go wrong with it.

reviews.headline: Fabulous
reviews.comments: I have used this product now for 4 months and my skin looks flawless it is glowing and moisturized too. It helps to keep the skin clear of blemishes and dark spots as well as cleans oil and makeup off. I will be a customer for the life of this product. Try the other lines of this too as they work well with this cleaner.

reviews.headline: Yes would buy again and again
reviews.comments: Love the buttah skin line which is made specifically for women of color. It keeps my skin smooth and supple and does not dry my skin out like other products. The face wash is light and provides suds to lather your face.

media.headline: My face is happy and it shows

faceoff_positive.comments:
I love all of these products. I use morning and night if needed . 
My face is glowing. The appearance is clear with so many compliments of how young I look. Love this cleanser
